snippet: Giorgos Germenis and Panagiotis Iliopoulos, lawmakers from the Golden Dawn party, were ordered to be detained pending trial on charges of joining and directing a criminal organization.
lead_paragraph: Giorgos Germenis and Panagiotis Iliopoulos, lawmakers from the Golden Dawn party, were ordered to be detained pending trial on charges of joining and directing a criminal organization.

headline.main: 2 Far-Right Greek Lawmakers Are Accused of Criminal Activity
headline.print_headline: 2 Far-Right Greek Lawmakers Are Accused of Criminal Activity
